src_text: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ref_text: Nga lo gué da ti rokoto â kugbé ti nginza ti â gbâ ti kodro, â nduru täpandë ti kusala a yeke talato ti ndôkua ti kozô Gbeon gbia sô a yeke na lè ti kugbé ti nginza ti dollar 5 ti Canada nga na lè ti kugbé ti dollar 100.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
ref_text: A fa polele na gigi sô na ngoye ti â ngü 20 ti lo. Na yâ ti mbéni patara, Bieber a tènè "[na ndëmbë sô tènè ti ndao sô a bâ mbi kété pèpè, â bibê ti mbi nga na â sambela ti mbi a sara bè ôko na â sewa ti a zo yé ti ngangu a sï na ala."
hyp_text: Ane kɔnɔ tɔn ɲɛ 20-30 tɔnɔ. A yɔmɔ, Bieber tɔnɔ: 'Mɔnɔ tɔnɔ kɔnɔ tɔnɔ, mɔnɔ tɔnɔ ɲɛnɔ kɔnɔ tɔnɔ, mɔnɔ tɔnɔ kɔnɔ tɔnɔ ɲɛnɔ kɔnɔ tɔnɔ.'

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: A ködörö-gbïä ota ayeke fade ala so tuku mênë mingi na ya ti ngbêne mbai ti chine. A zo saki ngbangbo na ndo ni a wara kua na ya ti bira ni tene ti ngo gingo lêgë ti dutingo na ndo ti mbata so ayeke na nduzu ti ti kota yongu na Xi’an.
